name: Intergalactic Wizard Force Turkish Localization
description:
Hello,

This is our submission for LocJAM's recent localization marathon. It is the Turkish localization of an indie game called "Intergalactic Wizard Force" by me (Berfu Gülay) and Uğur Ünal.

This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International License.

The LanaPixel font (c) 2020, eishiya (https://mastodon.art/@eishiya) is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License.
